name: @freemework/sql.postgres
description: Postgres SQL Facade library of the Freemework Project.

scripts.clean: find src \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.d.ts' -o -name '*.map' \) -exec rm {} \; ; find test \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.d.ts' -o -name '*.map' \) -exec rm {} \;
scripts.build:package: rm -rf .dist && mkdir .dist && cp -a src .dist/ &&  echo '// Content of this file is autogenerated by "npm run build:package"' > .dist/src/package_info.ts && echo 'export const packageInfo = Object.freeze(' >> .dist/src/package_info.ts &&  jq '{ name: .name, version: .version }' package.json >> .dist/src/package_info.ts && echo ');' >> .dist/src/package_info.ts && find .dist/src \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.d.ts' -o -name '*.map' \) -exec rm {} \; && tsc --project tsconfig-package-types.json && tsc --project tsconfig-package-esm.json && tsc --project tsconfig-package-cjs.json && cp README.md .dist/ && jq '{ name: .name, version: .version, description: .description, author: .author, contributors: .contributors, license: .license, keywords: .keywords, repository: .repository, bugs: .bugs, engines: .engines, dependencies: .dependencies, homepage: .homepage, type: .type, types: "types/index.d.ts", exports: { import: "./lib/esm/index.js", require: "./lib/cjs/index.js", default: "./lib/esm/index.js" } }' package.json > .dist/package.json &&  echo '{"type": "module"}' | jq . > .dist/lib/esm/package.json && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' | jq . > .dist/lib/cjs/package.json
scripts.test: rm -rf coverage && tsc && c8 mocha --require source-map-support/register --recursive --timeout 30000 "test/**/*.test.js"
